dataset.title: A Messinian (latest Miocene) occurrence for Albanerpeton Estes & Hoffstetter, 1976 (Lissamphibia: Albanerpetontidae) at Moncucco Torinese, Piedmont Basin, northwestern Italy, and a review of the European Cenozoic record for albanerpetontids

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gardner, James D., Villa, Andrea, Colombero, Simone, Venczel, Márton, Delfino, Massimo (2021): A Messinian (latest Miocene) occurrence for Albanerpeton Estes & Hoffstetter, 1976 (Lissamphibia: Albanerpetontidae) at Moncucco Torinese, Piedmont Basin, northwestern Italy, and a review of the European Cenozoic record for albanerpetontids. Geodiversitas 43 (14): 391-404, DOI: 10.5252/geodiversitas2021v43a14

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

gbif.citation: Gardner J D, Villa A, Colombero S, Venczel M, Delfino M, felipe (2021). A Messinian (latest Miocene) occurrence for Albanerpeton Estes & Hoffstetter, 1976 (Lissamphibia: Albanerpetontidae) at Moncucco Torinese, Piedmont Basin, northwestern Italy, and a review of the European Cenozoic record for albanerpetontids. Plazi.org taxonomic treatments database. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.5252/geodiversitas2021v43a14 accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-08-28.
